buttonCallback.desc: Sets/clears the button callback function for a deck
buttonCallback.doc:
Sets/clears the button callback function for a deck

Parameters:
 * fn - A function to be called when a button is pressed/released on the stream deck. It should receive three arguments:
  * The hs.streamdeck userdata object
  * A number containing the button that was pressed/released
  * A boolean indicating whether the button was pressed (true) or released (false)

Returns:
 * The hs.streamdeck device
buttonCallback.name: buttonCallback
parameters:
* fn - A function to be called when a button is pressed/released on the stream deck. It should receive three arguments:
   * The hs.streamdeck userdata object
   * A number containing the button that was pressed/released
   * A boolean indicating whether the button was pressed (true) or released (false)

buttonLayout.desc: Gets the layout of buttons the device has
buttonLayout.doc:
Gets the layout of buttons the device has

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The number of columns
 * The number of rows
buttonLayout.name: buttonLayout

discoveryCallback.desc: Sets/clears a callback for reacting to device discovery events
discoveryCallback.doc:
Sets/clears a callback for reacting to device discovery events

Parameters:
 * fn - A function that will be called when a Streaming Deck is connected or disconnected. It should take the following arguments:
  * A boolean, true if a device was connected, false if a device was disconnected
  * An hs.streamdeck object, being the device that was connected/disconnected

Returns:
 * None
discoveryCallback.name: discoveryCallback
parameters:
* fn - A function that will be called when a Streaming Deck is connected or disconnected. It should take the following arguments:
   * A boolean, true if a device was connected, false if a device was disconnected
   * An hs.streamdeck object, being the device that was connected/disconnected

firmwareVersion.desc: Gets the firmware version of a deck
firmwareVersion.doc:
Gets the firmware version of a deck

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the firmware version of the deck
firmwareVersion.name: firmwareVersion
returns: * A string containing the firmware version of the deck

getDevice.desc: Gets an hs.streamdeck object for the specified device
getDevice.doc:
Gets an hs.streamdeck object for the specified device

Parameters:
 * num - A number that should be within the bounds of the number of connected devices

Returns:
 * An hs.streamdeck object
getDevice.name: getDevice
parameters: * num - A number that should be within the bounds of the number of connected devices

init.desc: Initialises the Stream Deck driver and sets a discovery callback
init.doc:
Initialises the Stream Deck driver and sets a discovery callback

Parameters:
 * fn - A function that will be called when a Streaming Deck is connected or disconnected. It should take the following arguments:
  * A boolean, true if a device was connected, false if a device was disconnected
  * An hs.streamdeck object, being the device that was connected/disconnected

Returns:
 * None

Notes:
 * This function must be called before any other parts of this module are used
init.name: init
notes: * This function must be called before any other parts of this module are used
parameters:
* fn - A function that will be called when a Streaming Deck is connected or disconnected. It should take the following arguments:
   * A boolean, true if a device was connected, false if a device was disconnected
   * An hs.streamdeck object, being the device that was connected/disconnected

numDevices.desc: Gets the number of Stream Deck devices connected
numDevices.doc:
Gets the number of Stream Deck devices connected

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A number containing the number of Stream Deck devices attached to the system
numDevices.name: numDevices
returns: * A number containing the number of Stream Deck devices attached to the system

reset.doc:
Resets a deck

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The hs.streamdeck object
reset.name: reset

serialNumber.desc: Gets the serial number of a deck
serialNumber.doc:
Gets the serial number of a deck

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the serial number of the deck
serialNumber.name: serialNumber
returns: * A string containing the serial number of the deck

setBrightness.desc: Sets the brightness of a deck
setBrightness.doc:
Sets the brightness of a deck

Parameters:
 * brightness - A whole number between 0 and 100 indicating the percentage brightness level to set

Returns:
 * The hs.streamdeck device
setBrightness.name: setBrightness
parameters: * brightness - A whole number between 0 and 100 indicating the percentage brightness level to set

setButtonColor.desc: Sets a button on the deck to the specified color
setButtonColor.doc:
Sets a button on the deck to the specified color

Parameters:
 * button - A number (from 1 to 15) describing which button to set the color on
 * color - An hs.drawing.color object

Returns:
 * The hs.streamdeck object
setButtonColor.name: setButtonColor
parameters: * button - A number (from 1 to 15) describing which button to set the color on

setButtonImage.desc: Sets the image of a button on the deck
setButtonImage.doc:
Sets the image of a button on the deck

Parameters:
 * button - A number (from 1 to 15) describing which button to set the image for
 * image - An hs.image object

Returns:
 * The hs.streamdeck object
setButtonImage.name: setButtonImage
parameters: * button - A number (from 1 to 15) describing which button to set the image for
